DOC.brief_summary: Corneal abrasion ( TCA ) common ophthalmic emergency disease , account 10 % American ophthalmic emergency , account 22 % ophthalmic emergency Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center . Clinical emergency treatment TCA relatively simple effective , corneal epithelial damage recover within 48 hour . However , 25 % TCA would develop recurrence exfoliation . Once recurrence TCA , treatment would difficult even cause blindness . Therefore , great practical significance prevent recurrence TCA . However , effective method prevent recurrence TCA . 0.3 % sodium hyaluronate eye drop effectively supplement shortage tear promote repair corneal epithelium . On basis , investigator hypotheses 0.3 % sodium hyaluronate eye drop prevent recurrence TCA . So , investigator intend test effectiveness 0.3 % sodium hyaluronate drop prevent recurrence TCA prospective , single center , randomize , control pilot study . In study , 60 patient TCA randomly divide control group sodium hyaluronate treatment group observe one year .
DOC.brief_title: 0.3 % Sodium Hyaluronate Eye Drop Prevent Recurrent Corneal Epithelium Exfoliation
